Anandisautsa kawirikawiri kuyambira ubwana wanga,anene tsono Israele;
Anandisautsa kawirikawiri kuyambira ubwana wanga;koma sanandilake.
Olima analima pamsana panga;anatalikitsa mipere yao.
Yehova ndiye wolungama;anadulatu zingwe za oipa.
Achite manyazi nabwerere m'mbuyo.Onse akudana naye Ziyoni.
Akhale ngati udzu womera patsindwi,wakufota asanauzule;
umene womweta sadzaza nao dzanja lake,kapena womanga mitolo sakupatira manja.
Angakhale opitirirapo sanena,Dalitso la Mulungu likhale pa inu;tikudalitsani m'dzina la Yehova.
